Tutorial Extras Setup

Source: R/zzz_setup.R
tutorialExtras_setup.Rd

Define if the tutorial is an exam, if the exam has a max_retry and cooldown, and if a tutorial has a max_attempt limit on quiz questions.

Usage

tutorialExtras_setup(
  is_exam = FALSE,
  max_attempt = Inf,
  max_retry = Inf,
  retry_cooldown = 24
)

Arguments

is_exam

defaults to FALSE. If the tutorial is an exam with a lock button set to TRUE.

max_attempt

stop allowing submits if max_attempt is reached.

max_retry

stop allowing re-attempts when max_retry is reached.

retry_cooldown

length of time after lock is pressed until retry becomes available (in hours). Default = 24
